data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Mersin.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mersin, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Mersin
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Mersin, Turkey not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 640 believers in Mersin to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,705,160 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Hemshin people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Hemshin people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Hemshin people is yours.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Mersin.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Mersin, Turkey.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mersin, Turkey has a population of 1,705,800.

We estimate Mersin has 640 people who might know Jesus, 9,549 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,695,611 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,665 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Mersin, Turkey to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
